Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Colfax
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, Yates, 83rd, Exchange and 79th; WB: 79th, South Shore and 75th, Yates and 79th : due to street blockage near 79th/Colfax.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Colfax due to street blockage near 79th/Colfax.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Yates, 83rd, Exchange and 79th including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, South Shore, 75th, Yates and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
